snippet: Federal authorities have begun a criminal investigation into a huge coal ash spill into the Dan River, demanding that Duke Energy and state regulators hand over documents related to the accident.
abstract: Federal authorities begin criminal investigation into huge coal ash spill into North Carolina's Dan River, demanding that Duke Energy and state regulators hand over documents related to the accident.
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities have begun a criminal investigation into a huge coal ash spill into the Dan River, demanding that Duke Energy and state regulators hand over documents related to the accident.

headline.main: North Carolina: Federal Prosecutors Seek Records Related to Sludge Spill
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Federal Prosecutors Seek Records Related to Sludge Spill
